title: Reporting someone for boosting
body: I just had a game with someone claiming he's boosting a friend (not sure if he's on the account or pre-made). I reported him but can Riot do anything without some human reading the chat? Do I have to send a report ticket in? I have a screencap.

replies.body: If they are using somebody's else account, then that's forbidden and the system have automated checks to detect it (like IP changes, APM differences, etc) and they're pretty accurate. IF they're premaking, then it's 100% legit (unfortunately) and there's noting to be done about it. If only Riot kept they word and made Solo Queue solo, but since they allow premades in it there's nothing prohibiting people to play for high level smurfs to boost them by duoing with them.
reporting after the game is enough but its hard to proof
